chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 Pro has a problem as follows:
The package is indicated as delivered but it's not in my mailbox.
Thank you for your help,

Hello,

The recipient of this order claims not to have received it, although the tracking shows that it has been delivered. 

We have asked the customer to look for the parcel in case it has been delivered to a neighbour or family member. 

If they cannot find the parcel, we have asked them to provide the certificate of non-receipt and their ID.

Please send us a proof of delivery (POD) with the customer's signature, a photo of the parcel given to the customer, or a screenshot showing the GPS location of the delivery, within 2 working days. 

Please note: any other proof of delivery will not be considered relevant (for example, an unsigned document or an unclear photo).

— If a proof of delivery is provided, the customer will be required to provide a police report in order for the claim to be processed. 

Only reports requiring the customer to attend the police station will be accepted.
— If no acknowledgement of receipt is provided within 2 working days: only an identity document + a certificate of non-receipt will be required.

If the parcel is lost and the customer has provided all the necessary documents, they may choose to be reimbursed.

In this case, we recommend that you block the device, if possible.

In case the order is not found and the customer chooses a replacement, are you able to send one?

If not, we'll handle the refund within 3 business days.

Thanks for your help.

Looking forward to hearing from you,

Victoire, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for assisting the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID. We will check with our logistics partner. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
KW

Dear Backcare,

Please tell the customer is HANDWRITTEN CND with IMEI of the device.

Regards,
KW

Dear Backcare,

This is the POD.

Regards,
KW

Dear ecomobile

I acknowledge receipt of your messages.

We are still waiting for the customer with the requested documents.

We will keep you informed as soon as we hear back from the customer.

Regards,

Victoire from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We are still waiting for the customer with the requested documents. Our logistics partner also requires DPD CND. Kindly ask the customer to prepare this document. Thank you.

Regards,
KW
